data.name: Aerofly FS 4 - Scenery: Europe Part 2
data.detailed_description: The Europe Scenery DLCs 1 and 2 add over 800 detailed European airports, more aerial images, building and tree data and higher resolution elevation data to your Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator. We recommend installing both DLCs, Europe Part 1 and 2.
data.about_the_game: The Europe Scenery DLCs 1 and 2 add over 800 detailed European airports, more aerial images, building and tree data and higher resolution elevation data to your Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator. We recommend installing both DLCs, Europe Part 1 and 2.
data.short_description: Expand your Aerofly FS 4 scenery with over 800 detailed European airports, aerial images, building and tree data.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 or Vulkan compatible 3D graphics card with at least 3 GB of RAM
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics:

  • OS: macOS Mojave or newer (10.14.xx)

  • Storage: 80 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
